sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-company-profile', templateUrl: './company-profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./company-profile.component.css'] }) export class CompanyProfileComponent implements OnInit { profileForm!: FormGroup; logoPreview: string | ArrayBuffer | null = null; countryList = ['India', 'United States', 'United Kingdom', 'Australia', 'Canada']; cityList = ['Mumbai', 'Delhi', 'Bangalore', 'New York', 'London', 'Sydney']; industryList = ['Technology', 'Finance', 'Healthcare', 'Education', 'Retail']; formFields: any[] = [ { label: '1. Company Name', controlName: 'companyName', type: 'text', placeholder: 'Type in your Company Name here...' }, { label: '2. Company Email', controlName: 'companyEmail', type: 'email', placeholder: 'Written by Default (Same as Sign Up)' }, { label: '3. Company Website/LinkedIn Link', controlName: 'companyWebsite', type: 'text', placeholder: 'Drop your website or LinkedIn link here...' }, { label: '4. Company Logo', controlName: 'companyLogo', type: 'upload', placeholder: 'Click here to upload your company logo' }, { label: '5. Head Office Country', controlName: 'country', type: 'select', options: this.countryList, placeholder: 'Choose Country from the drop-down' }, { label: '6. Head Office City', controlName: 'city', type: 'select', options: this.cityList, placeholder: 'Choose City from the drop-down' }, { label: '7. Company’s Industry', controlName: 'industry', type: 'select', options: this.industryList, placeholder: 'Choose Industry from the drop-down' }, { label: '8. Company Size', controlName: 'size', type: 'text', placeholder: 'How big is your team? e.g. 11–50 people' }, { label: '9. Contact Person Name', controlName: 'contactName', type: 'text', placeholder: 'Type in Full name of your point of contact...' }, { label: '10. Contact Person Email/No', controlName: 'contactEmail', type: 'text', placeholder: 'Type in the best email or number to reach you...' } ]; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit() { this.profileForm = this.fb.group({ companyName: ['', Validators.required], companyEmail: [{ value: '', disabled: true }], companyWebsite: ['', Validators.required], companyLogo: [null], country: ['', Validators.required], city: ['', Validators.required], industry: ['', Validators.required], size: ['', Validators.required], contactName: ['', Validators.required], contactEmail: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], about: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(100)]] }); } onLogoChange(event: any) { const file = event.target.files[0]; if (file) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => (this.logoPreview = reader.result); reader.readAsDataURL(file); this.profileForm.patchValue({ companyLogo: file }); } } onSubmit() { if (this.profileForm.valid) { alert('Profile submitted!'); } else { this.profileForm.markAllAsTouched(); } } // ✅ Group fields into rows of 2 for styling get formFieldsGroupedByTwo() { const grouped = []; for (let i = 0; i < this.formFields.length; i += 2) { grouped.push([this.formFields[i], this.formFields[i + 1]]); } return grouped; } }

COMPANY PROFILE

COMPLETE IT TO PROCEED! TAKES 5 MINS TOPS!

arrow_drop_down
Upto 100 words
